about_the_game:
Search for the scattered items within the planet to prevent a planetary collision.

Standing at the pillar in front of the book will grant you immense knowledge.

Clear counts for each difficulty level are saved and will be used in future updates.

-------------STORY-------------

Two space explorers, Ria and Jake, had built a space base on the vast Delta planet and were living there. They relied on each other as they undertook dangerous planetary exploration missions. The Delta planet was a mysterious place filled with endless red deserts and home to gigantic, multi-meter-long death worms.

One day, Ria took on an exploration mission while Jake handled administrative tasks, as they usually did. Ria was deep into her exploration, discovering new resources. Suddenly, the ground started to shake, and a massive death worm charged towards Ria. The creature, with its multi-meter-long body, wrapped around and attacked her. Ria fought desperately but ultimately succumbed to the relentless assault of the death worm.

Jake was handling administrative tasks when he received Ria's urgent distress signal. "Jake! Death worm... help!" Ria's last message sent a chill down Jake's spine. He quickly grabbed his rescue gear and rushed out of the space base. But at that moment, an alert warned him that Delta and Hades planets were on a collision course.

"This can't be happening, there's no time!" Jake hurried to the elemental missile control room. The elemental missile was Delta planet's only means of defense and the only way to prevent the collision with Hades. Jake swiftly prepared the missile for launch. His hands trembled with tension, but he couldn't afford to waste a single moment if he was to save his friend and protect the planet.

"Ria, please hold on just a bit longer!" Jake prayed as he pressed the missile launch button. The elemental missile streaked across the sky towards the Hades planet, and with a brilliant flash, it successfully averted the collision. Despite this, Jake's heart remained heavy with worry. He immediately rushed to where Ria was.

------------- Key Features -------------

1. Planet Exploration: Numerous items are scattered across the planet, and you must explore to collect them.

2. Resource Gambling: Increase your resources by engaging in gambling.

3. Sword Skill: Obtain a position-saving skill that can be activated with a right-click.

4. Tower Resources and Knowledge: Acquire immense resources from the top of towers and gain knowledge by reading books.

5. Zombie Race: Earn tokens through zombie races and select rewards; if you're lucky, you can obtain a double booster.

6. Missile Upgrade: Enhance and purchase missiles to destroy surrounding planets.

7. Runes and Victory: Destroy planets to collect runes, which can be used to upgrade missiles and prevent the collision with planet Hades to achieve victory.

* Knowledge increases the minimum acquisition of resources

name: StellarDefender

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10, Window 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Search for the scattered items within the planet to prevent a planetary collision.Let's search for supplies scattered across the planet, build a foundation, and launch a compressed-power missile to eliminate other planets that threaten the Delta planet.
